changeSet.author: rodrigo.fischer
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE USERS ( user_id SERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, phone CHAR(11), email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(512) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, profile_link VARCHAR(512) NOT NULL, deleted BOOLEAN NOT NULL, created_at DATE NOT NULL, updated_at DATE );

changeSet.author: rodrigo.fischer
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE POSTS ( post_id SERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INTEGER NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, photo_link VARCHAR(512), video_link VARCHAR(512), private BOOLEAN NOT NULL, created_at DATE NOT NULL, updated_at DATE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES USERS(user_id) );

changeSet.author: rodrigo.fischer
